org.nd4j.nativeblas

Class Nd4jCpu.Context

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bytedeco.javacpp.Pointer
      • org.nd4j.nativeblas.Nd4jCpu.ContextPrototype
        • org.nd4j.nativeblas.Nd4jCpu.Context
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AutoCloseable
    Enclosing class:
    Nd4jCpu

    @Namespace(value="nd4j::graph")
 @NoOffset
public static class Nd4jCpu.Context
extends Nd4jCpu.ContextPrototype
    This class defines input desired for any given node/operation within graph
